title: The AI-Robot Brain (NVIDIA Isaac)
description: Implement perception, navigation, and AI integration using NVIDIA Isaac Sim and Isaac ROS for advanced robotics applications
learningOutcomes: Understand NVIDIA Isaac ecosystem and simulation tools
Implement perception algorithms for robot vision and sensing
Create navigation workflows with visual SLAM and path planning
Develop object detection pipelines for robotic perception
Integrate Isaac ROS navigation tools for biped robots
Apply AI techniques for robot decision making and control
prerequisites: Basic understanding of AI and computer vision
